aphorism.1: The roots of education are bitter , but the fruit is sweet .
aphorism.2: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet .
aphorism.3: To sensible men, every day is a day of reckoning.
aphorism.4: I have nothing to offer but blood , toil tears and sweat .
aphorism.5: Never leave that until tomorrow , which you can do today .
